app.service

Class WebCrawler

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.service.WebCrawler

  • @Service
public class WebCrawler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that handles fetching references from ACM Digital Library

      • searchField

        public static java.lang.String searchField(java.lang.String bibtex,
                                           java.lang.String field,
                                           java.lang.Character start,
                                           java.lang.Character end)
        This method helps finding the right field and data from BibTex
        Parameters:
        bibtex - - formalized data called bibtex
        field - - the field header we are looking for like "title", so title = {title of the publication}
        start - - data begins after this starting character
        end - - data ends before this ending character
        Returns:
        String - the data value
